video.title: 1992: Berlusconi Rising
video.synopsis: Based on historical events, this crime drama centers on Italian operation "Clean Hands," set in motion to tame the tide of political corruption.

episodes.synopsis: Politician Mario Chiesa's arrest opens up one of Italy's biggest bribery scandals. Six lives intertwine as a result of the political fallout.
episodes.title: Chapter 1

episodes.synopsis: Marketing executive Leonardo Notte attempts to hide his questionable past, while police officer Luca Pastore takes steps toward getting even.
episodes.title: Chapter 2

episodes.synopsis: Officer Pastore's revenge seems satisfied, while Leonardo falls victim to extortion and Gulf War veteran Pietro loses enthusiasm for parliament.
episodes.title: Chapter 3

episodes.synopsis: Effects of a judge's anti-corruption crusade are felt as the "clean hands" legacy takes hold, while Milan's power elite are shaken by a suicide.
episodes.title: Chapter 4

episodes.synopsis: Lives are shaken in the wake of political corruption scandals and arrests: Luca faces his inner demons, while Pietro and Veronica are growing apart.
episodes.title: Chapter 5

episodes.synopsis: Luca's secret meeting with Bibi brings him closer to the powerful Mainaghi corporation; meanwhile, the country is devastated by a new Mafia attack.
episodes.title: Chapter 6

episodes.synopsis: While old-guard politicians works on a counterattack, Luca jump-starts his investigation by breaking a few rules and Pietro focuses on war veterans.
episodes.title: Chapter 7

episodes.synopsis: As more corrupt politicians are destroyed, Pietro suspects a mole on the "clean hands" team, and Leo's personal life sparks a career crisis of faith.
episodes.title: Chapter 8

episodes.synopsis: As the investigation continues, deep-rooted political corruption rises closer to the surface; meanwhile, Luca risks his position with the task force.
episodes.title: Chapter 9

episodes.synopsis: As the investigation closes in on a vast corruption network, Italy's Prime Minister and its entire political system is on the verge of upheaval.
episodes.title: Chapter 10
